org.dbasu.robomvvm.util

Class ObjectTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.util.ObjectTagger

  • public class ObjectTagger
extends java.lang.Object
    Associates arbitrary tags with a supplied object. The tags are indexed using a String key. Stores weak references to the supplied objects to allow them to be garbage collected. Automatically removes associated tags when its object is garbage collected.

      • removeTag

        public static java.lang.Object removeTag(java.lang.Object object,
                         java.lang.String key)
        Removes a tag associated with an object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to remove the tag from.
        key - The String index of the tag to remove.
        Returns:
        The tag that has been removed. Null if no such tag exists.

        Gets a tag associated with an object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to get the tag of.
        key - The String index of the tag to get.
        Returns:
